verses.name: Acts 21:4
verses.text: And finding disciples, we tarried there seven days: who said to Paul through the Spirit, that he should not go up to Jerusalem.

verses.name: Acts 21:5
verses.text: And when we had accomplished those days, we departed and went our way; and they all brought us on our way, with wives and children, till we were out of the city: and we kneeled down on the shore, and prayed.

verses.name: Acts 21:6
verses.text: And when we had taken our leave one of another, we took ship; and they returned home again.
